AbstractSignalData - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data
The class AbstractSignalData is the common type of all signal data, be it single or composed.
AbstractSignalData() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.AbstractSignalData
create a signal data with the current time as time stamp, the current host as time stamper and its hardware clock giving the time reference.
AbstractSignalData(Instant) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.AbstractSignalData
create a signal data with the given time stamp and the current host as time stamper and its hardware clock giving the time reference.
AbstractSignalData(Instant, String) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.AbstractSignalData
create a signal data with the given time stamp, time stamper identity and the current host hardware clock giving the time reference.
AbstractSignalData(AcceleratedClock) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.AbstractSignalData
create a signal data with the current time as time stamp, the current host as time stamper and the given accelerated clock giving the time reference.
AbstractSignalData(AcceleratedClock, Instant) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.AbstractSignalData
create a signal data with the given time stamp and the current host as time stamper.
ac - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.alasca.physical_data.TimedEntity
accelerated clock giving the time reference, if any.
ac - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.hem.HEM

ACCELERATION_FACTOR - Static variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.CVMIntegrationTest
for real time simulations, the acceleration factor applied to the the simulated time to get the execution time of the simulations.
AdjustableCI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025.bases
The component interface AdjustableCI defines the standardised operation that an equipment implements to let a household energy manager adjust or suspend them i.e.
AdjustableConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.hem
The class AdjustableConnector is a plain standard BCM4Java connector assuming that the inbound port offers the same component interface AdjustableCI.
